options.optionText: Grace… what exactly are you doing?
options.responseText: *gasps loudly, pulling her hands away and covering her flushed face* Wh-what?! I-I wasn’t…! I mean… okay fine, I was! God, this is so embarrassing…

followUpOptions.optionText: Don't worry, it's okay to take care of yourself.
followUpOptions.responseText: *buries her face in her hands* Yeah but… not when someone’s standing right there watching! Ugh… can you, like, not look at me like that?

followUpOptions.optionText: Looks like someone took my advice to heart.
followUpOptions.responseText: *glares through her blush* Shut up. You were the one who told me about it, remember? I just… wanted to see what the big deal was…
*groans, still covering her face* I don’t know, okay?! It felt… weird but… kinda nice… oh my god, why are we even TALKING about this?!
*eyes widen in horror* EXCUSE ME?! Oh my god, no! Just… go away!!

followUpOptions.optionText: Don’t stop on my account. Looks like you were having fun.
followUpOptions.responseText: *throws a pillow at you* Shut up shut up shut up! Ugh, you’re such a perv…

followUpOptions.optionText: Wow… guess the vault life is getting to you already.
followUpOptions.responseText: *pouts, still beet red* Yeah, well… maybe I’m just… curious. It’s boring here, okay?! Don’t make it weird…
